div.p:
The xvj dai of December yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij / comperit before William blindsel ane of
the ballies of abirdene Johne pawdy and has constitute and ordanit Alexander Irvin son and
apparand ayr til the lard of Drum maistir Androw cadiou and William cadiou his bruthir'
coniunctly and seueralie his lachful procuratouris actouris and factouris topersew folou and re
covir al gudis tane fra him oute of his buthe and of his hous' be alexander nachty and
be quhatsumeuir vthiris / And has reuokit al gift made be his wif quhilk mycht
turn him til preiudice or scath / giffand his ful power' til his forsaidis procuratouris to do
and defend for him in the forsaid caus' and al vthiris concerning him promittand tohald ferm and
stabil with al vthir clausis of procuratory necessar' or opertune / witnes John' glenmaluin
William giffard patrik clerc philp of Dunbrek seriand and vthir sindry

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos eiusdem xijo die mensis
Januarij anno Domini supradicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

The samen dai be the decrete of the court the ballies chargit Robert crag til content
and pay til thom hatmakar' four' Danskin merkis within terme of law eftir the tenour of
the act of the last appointment made betuix the saidis robert and thomas tharuppon . be
cause the said robert falyeit in the entra of Wil richartson for the quhilk he com
souerty tilhaf vndirlyne the challance of the said thomas this day / and tomak pay
ment to the said thomas of the said some odir in Danskin waring or as lent siluer hame
that tyme

Thomas de marr' secundo die vocatus responsurus per se aut procuratores ad sectam procuratorum dominj comitis Huntlie
non comparuit / quare precipitur seriando quod capto districto et cetera ipsum summoniat ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam 3m diem

Johannes de Kintor filius et heres quondam gilberti Kintor protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu xiiij s'
de quadam terra vasta in vico furcarum ut supra Ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die processus / testibus gilberto garuiach ricardo
bernis burgensibus et Duncano straloch seriando

Eodem die dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator altaris beati Duthaci in ecclesia
beati nicholai de abirdene accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu duode
cim solidorum et sex denariorum dicto altari et capellano eiusdem debit' et a longo tempore non solut'
de quadam terra vasta iacente in vico nauium inter terram Johannis more ex orientali parte et terram
magni Wormot ex occidentali parte Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram
et lapides quos presentavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam primo die huius processus / testibus Willelmo
cvmyn thoma narn et philippo de Dunbrek seriandorum vno

Willelmus andirson filius et heres quondam Jacobi andirson protestabatur pro annuo redditu iiijor solidorum
et octo denariorum de quadam terra in vico viridi ut patet in rotulamento precedenti Ad quam accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam secundo die processus / testibus
Roberto ewynson Willelmo sprunt et Duncano straloch seriando

Eodem die dominus edwardus roberti capellanus ac procurator altaris Sancti petri in ecclesia parrochiali
huius burgi accedens ad barram protestacionem fecit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu
quatuor solidorum dicto altari et capellano eiusdem debit' annuatim de quadam terra Jacente in
vico viridi ex parte occidentali eiusdem vici inter terram Willelmi andree ex parte boreali et terram henrici
mortymer ex parte australi et communem viam regiam tam ex parte orientali quam occidentali Ad quam
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia coram balliuis
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne stewart filio adam hervy et moricio besat seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram religiosus vir frater Johannes rettre prior fratrum carmelitorum
de abirdene protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum et octo denariorum eidem priori et
conuentui eiusdem loci annuatim debit' et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam terra vasta iacente in vico
inferiori ecclesie parrochiali de abirdene ex boriali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis malisson ex occi
dentali parte et terram alexandri alanson ex orientali parte Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit dis
tringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Dauid menyes seniore fergusio blithe adam hervy et moricio besat seriando burgi

Item idem prior fratrum carmelitarum protestabatur pro annuo redditu viginti denariorum de quadam
terra vasta iacente in li grene ex boriali parte vici eiusdem citra pontem inter terram Johannis
hil ex occidentali parte et terram thome quhite ex orientali parte priori et conuentui eiusdem
loci annuatim debit' Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu recu
perando preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus
eisdem personis seriando supradictis

Item eodem die henricus owrum extendit plegium super thomam quhite de iniusta detencione
v solidorum g' viij g' et x g' monete flandrie ab eodem quj quidem thomas peciit diem legalem
ad respondendum et ballivi assignauerunt eidem hodie ad quindenam

The xiiij dai of Januar' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij henry rede in Kinkorth grantit him
awand til alexander rede burges of abirdene twa barellis of salmond / tobe pait til
the said alexander or his assignais at mydsummir next tocum or xv dais thareftir but
langar delay / for the quhilk payment lelely and treuly tobe made he is
oblist be the faith of his body before thir witnes Jhone gregory John' henri
son Duncan straloch seriand and vthiris diuers'

the xvij dai of Januar' yer' forsaid Androw Wenton' Wilyam of tulidef and gilbert leche
has present in the tolbuthe before the ballies and consel Wilyam glastre of the glak thom
of chamer and androw crukschank as thai that com law borgh to present the saidis
personis this dai be x houris or tharby for the strublans made betuix thame and
Alexander of abirdour' and for the hurting of him

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies the xx dai of Januar' yer' forsaid
thom gardner Wil clerk Wil buchan thom of buchan and Wil burges baxtaris convict be
ane assise ar adiugit ilkane in amerciament for breking of paas' and for sel
ling of brede to singulare folkis and nocht commonly til al men

Item the said thom of buchan is convict / for the prevening and owyrbijng of his nich
buris makand derrar price

Eodem die Robertus culan extendit plegium super Johannem stewart de iniusta detencione
decem librarum de terminis transactis pro quibus deuenit debitor / quj quidem Johannes peciit
diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio et ballivi assignauerunt eidem proximum diem legalem

It is ordanit be ane assise of wourthy burgez that in tym tocum na fleschar' sal sel j quartar
of multon derrer' than x d' and the multon bouke for xl d' of the best / and vthir muton'
nocht sa gude tobe sald thareftir / And that the flescharis brak na flesch quhil thai warn
the prisaris and that it be prysit na sel nane derrer' than it beis prysit vndir the pain
of eschet of the flesch and the vnlaw vnforgevin

Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per Dauid marr' vnum ballivorum eiusdem xxjo die Januarij
anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo /

quo die Johannes portar posuit se in voluntate ballivi de iniusta perturbacione Dauid
spens . vnde adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendare eidem Dauid spens ad visum proborum virorum
Et iniungitur dicto Johanni per assisam pro emenda ad dandum j libra cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis
Et inuenit Idem Johannes / Johannem glenny plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Dauid spens aliter
quam per viam Juris

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per ballivos eiusdem xxvjto die Januarij anno
Domini supradicto / quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Johannes stewart super quem Robertus culan extendit plegium de iniusta detencione
x librarum / primo die vocatus ad comparendum responsurus dicto plegio / non comparuit / Ideo precipitur phi
lippo de Dunbrek seriendo capere districtum et cetera premunire dictum Johannem ad proximam cu
riam legalem tanquam secundum diem huius processus

Item eodem die procuratores domini comitis de huntly sepe vocati ad comperendum et prosequendum in causa aduersus
thomam de marr' mota racione assignacionis certorum bonorum dicto domino comiti per Robertum senyour'
non comparuerunt vnde dictus thomas porrexit plegium in manu moricij besat seriendi in presencia ro
berti senyour quod quitus fuit a clameo prefati domini comitis quo ad processus desuper prius
dediunt / donec attachiatus fuerit per nouam sectam / Insuper obtulit se nichilominus dictus thomas
presente robert senyour determinj assise aut arbitrij v aut vij virorum fidedignorum super dicta causa mota
tam pro parte dicti dominj quam Roberti senyour antedicti / testibus Johanne culan alexandro rede Johanne Waus
philippo de Dunbrek seriando et diuers' aliis

Robertus senyour ex vna et thomas de marr' partibus ex altera in omnibus clameis causis et
debatis inter eosdem tam racione actionis assignate ut asseretur domino comiti de huntly quam alias quouismodi sub
miserunt se certis personis infrascriptis videlicet Robert blindsel thome fife alexandro rede ade crafurd
gilberto leche Willelmo de tulidef et Johanni gregory / Et Juraverunt stare arbitrio et deter
minacioni eorundem / Et comparebunt partes predicte coram eis ad ostendendum Jura sua et raciones hinc inde
hodie ad quindenam / Et pronunciabunt decretum suum magno Juramento interuenien' citra carnis
priuium proximo futuro

The penult day of Januar' yer' forsaid / the counsail and hail communite of abirdene beand gadirit
in the tolbuthe has grantit with a consent ordanit and statute / that al nichburis and inhabitantis
of this burgh sal in tyme tocum haf thare wauppinnis and armis swerdis axis cellatis
and vthir fenssable geer' redy besyde thaim in thare buthis and houssis and cum with
thaim to the aldirman ballies or seriandis incontinent quhen thai see or heris thaim or ony
of thaim mystir help or supple in thare office doing for the attaching and correction of tres
passouris / and abstrak thaim nocht fra thare nichburis quhen thai se thaim wawnt
help or tobe in poynt of suppresion' and namly be outduellaris the burgh vndir the
pane of law tobe execute apon the brekaris of this statute but fauour / and of
the vnlaw tobe rasit vnforgevin

the samyn dai in a fensit court haldin be the ballies / Wil lauchlane callit to
compere before the ballies as he was oblist be his hand and gude faith / til
ansuer' and vndirly the law at the instance of the partie complenyand for the wrangwis'
strublance and hurting of Johne blackis wif and for strublans of the toune / and
for the public offens done be him to the said John' and his houshald and famile /
comperit nocht / quhar'uppon the ballies and consel avisit . the trespas considerit and the committar'
tharof beand fugitive fra the law . thai haf decretit with consent of the communite and ordanit
tobe made manifest be oppin proclamacion that fra thine furth na man nor woman
within the said burgh duelland tak apon hand tohouse herbry or resset the said Wil
lachlan in privay or in apert vndir the pane of bannising fra this burgh And gif of fors
he wald entir or herbry in ony hous' within the said burgh thai nocht beand of power'
toresist him / that the maistir of that hous' incontinent cum or send thar servand at the leist
til the officeris of the toune / and warn thaim tharof that thai may provide for remede
as efferis vndir the pain and charge forsaid

Item the action debatabile betuix the wideu of gilbert quhite and thom quhite of demj
pak of wald is continuit be ane assise to Wednisday the ferd dai of februar' / and
the parties ar chargit tobring sic preif and document that dai as thai wil tyne and wyn

The v dai of februar' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij / comperit in the court the ballies Ro
bert heryn on the behalf of a nobil and mychty lady the countas of huntly and
askit payment fra Dauid hil burges of abirdene of xix li' and x s' of scottis money
in faute of payment of thre li' g' and v s' g' of the monee of flandris acht til
malcum mowat as is contenit in ane act of appointment producit tharuppon be resoune
of assignacion of the said some' made to the said lady / And than the certificacion
schawne and red of the defaute of payment of the said some of flandris money
philp of Dunbrek seriand at the command' of the ballies layd wand on Dauid
hil and chargit him toremayn in the tolbuthe quhil he content and pait the Some
forsaid to the countas of huntly as assigna tharof or hir factouris et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus quelp comparens coram ballivis in Judicio fatebatur et obligavit se ac sua bona
piscarias ad releuandum thomam rolland de vna barella salmonum alias optent' super eum
per Willelmum moyses / et quod indempnem conseruabit eundem thomam penes quoscumque alios de omnibus
debitis et omnibus in quibus tenetur ex parte ipsius Willelmi quelp

Wat thomson convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament for the wrangwis' strublance of
marioun annand and til amend til hir as law wil

Item the said Walter in amerciament for the wranguis' owyrbijng of his nichbouris in the merket
And als' the assise deliuerit that he wrangit to the ballies dispersoning thaim be his langage

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem nono die mensis februarij
Anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiijo /

quo die Johannes stewart secundo die vocatus ad sectam Roberti cullane
responsurus pro iniusta detencione x librarum / non comparuit Ideo precipitur seriando capere districtum et cetera et
premunire dictum Johannem ad proximum diem legalem tanquam tercium diem huius processus / testibus quod
summonitus fuit ad istum diem Duncano lundoris Johanne steuart filio et andrea scot

Eodem die ballivi assignauerunt thome de marr' hodie ad quindenam ad respondendum plegio super eum
porrecto per Johannem vaus pro iniusta detencione xl solidorum ad bonum compotum

Thomas de marr' coram ballivis in Judicio fatebatur se releuare et indempnem conseruare
Robertum senyour de vna barella bituminis penes alexandrum rede

John' of lammynton and androw lammynton' convict be ane assise ar adiugit ilkane of thaim in amerciament
for the wrangwis' absenting of thaim fra the offerand on candilmesday

Item Androw lammynton' folowit be a borgh strekin be patrik andirson of the wrangwis hal
ding of the half of twa steris fra him . was adiugit in amerciament throu the deliuerence of
the assise quhilk fand that the said patrik suld haf the half of the twa steris and that
the said androw sal content and pay him tharof within terme of law

the samyn dai it was fundin and ordanit be the assise that Alexander blayr suld deliuer
and pay til John' grig ten stan' et demj of wol / tharof v stan' and demj now in hand that
he is pait for / and the v stan' remanand at beltane next tocum the said John' pay
and til him tharfor twa merkis / and the said alexander is in amerciament et cetera

Item alexander blayr convict be ane assise was adiugit in amerciament of the court for
the wrangwis' withhaldin of lviij s' fra Wil philp and tocontent him within terme of law

Item dictus Alexander blare conuictus fuit per dictam assisam de iniusta foristallacione huius burgi
lane pellium et corriorum / Et refertur inde correctio determinacioni communis consilij / plegio alexandro
hay pro introitu prefati alexandri blare coram consilio super premunicione iiijor dierum

The x dai of februar' yer' forsaid in the court before Dauid marr' ane of the ballies
Alexander hay grantit him souerty for alexander blare / to content John' grig and Wil philp of the wol
and siluer optenit be thaim eftir the tenor of the actis made tharupon / and tocontent the ballies of thare
vnlawis within viij dais or ellis toentir his person to thaim et cetera

The samen dai Alexander trail and Wilyam more summittit thaim in al actionis and clames debatabil
betuix thaim to the determinacion of thomas prat and alexander hay chosin be alexander trail / and til thomas
of marr' and henry owrum for William more / quhilkis persons beand sworn sal deliuer wppon
the said actionis betuix this and thorisdai the xij dai of this instant moneth of februar' eftir
thare knaulage / and the partiez ar oblist be the faith' of thare bodijs tovndirly thare decret

The xiiij dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxiij the consel has ordanit and concludit that na man
beand in the commission to the parliament / salhaf expens' of the toune / bot the Aldirman alla
nerly gif that he passis And this is done for the freing of the toune / and for the
comoun profite et cetera

the samyn dai comperit before the ballies in a fenssit court William cowpar with Alexander
chamer of murchil his forspekar' / and proponit and schew that he had set in feuferm he
ritably til Donald gilfullan ane land liand in the hede of the schipraw apon the
quhilk / twa houssis ar biggit / for j merk of annuel yerly tobe pait to the said
Wilyam / his ayris and assignais / And that the said Donald had analeit / and of the
said housis til thom of narne / annuel fre / the quhilk alienacion the said Wilyam de
clarit was made but his consent / quharfor he protestit solemply in presence of the
said thomas of narn . that quhat was done anent the said alienacion suld tvrn him
his ayris nor assignais til na scath nor preiudice in tym tocum / bot that he and thai
mycht distres the said twa housis and ilkane of thaim for the said annuel alsoft as
efferit or war neidful / And tharuppon he tuke instrument / Witnez Robert blind
sel alexander rede Walter achneve androw branch philp of Dunbrek seriand and ser John'
striuelin notar' with vthiris sindry

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be the ballies the xvj dai of februar' yer'
of god forsaid It was fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn assise that thom quhite aw til John'
the vaus' on the behalf of mariory fife his spous' j barel of Salmond be his obliga
cione / tobe pait within terme of law / les than the said thomas can preve as law wil the said barel pait
sen it is nocht diffesit apon the obligacion / And the ballies has assignit this day
xv dais to the said preif

Quo die quidam alexander conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro perturbio Willelmi sprunt et tenetur emendare
eidem ad visum proborum virorum

The xvij dai of februar' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij In the tolbuthe before the ballies and consel
comperit Alexander lesly of Wardris and clamit the toune of xiij merkis acht yerly of
thir twa yeris last bigane be the toune til our souerane lord and til him as Ressauour
in the tyme of the fermes of this burgh Of the quhilkis twa yeris James lesly
grantit him and oblist him be his landis and gudis to warand releve and keip scathles
the said burgh and ballies of the samyn of xiij merkis for a yer' in the quhilk he bure
office of aldirmanschip witnes heirof Alexander menyes alexander rede gilbert the vaus androw
branche Wilyam moyses and vthiris diuers'

The samen dai comperit before the ballies in Jugement Alexander huchonson and declarit that
he fischit ane half net / of the furdis on the behalf of alexander forbes . the quhilk he fischit
farnyer' / and that he intrometting with na fisching pertening til Wilyam moyses as fermorar'
til William giffard apon that wattir

Item thomas prat in the name and on the behalf of alexander angusson his gude son' comperand
before the ballies / exponit how that the said alexander was merchand til Dauid mathoson'
of demj last of Salmond / And offerit him in the name of his gude son' gif he had nocht ful
fillit the said Dauidis charge gevin him in bil / outhir' in wyne waring or siluer that he
was redy tofulfil it . and do tharto as efferit odir here or beyond the sey

the same dai Alexander lesly of wardris on the ta part / and James lesly on the tothir part / anent
the clame of xiij merkis acht til our soueran lord and the said alexander as ressauour til him in the
tyme the yer' that the said James was aldirman of abirdene / and of certane beer' clamit
be the said alexander / summittit and oblist thaim thare handis wphaldin tovndirly the deliuerence of
thir personis vndirwritin chosin and sworn as in ane assise that is tosay Alexander setoun of meldrum
alexander menyes george lesly John' of culan alexander rede alexander marr' and thomas prat /
quhilkis riply avisit has fundin and deliuerit be thare athis that James lesly suld
pay the said xiij merkis til alexander lesly And anent the clame of xvij bollis of beer'
thai ordane the said James to pay the said alexander / for euery bol that he prefis or makis
gude with ij or iij personis that knawis it / within xv dais before the aldirman or ballies of
this burgh that the said James intromettit with / alsmekil as beer' was sald in abirdene
in the tyme that he resavit it /

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies the xix dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxiij
William quelp and Robert Kintor comperit before the aldirman ballies and diuers of the consale
and oblist thaim be the faith of thare bodijs of thar awn' free wil til stand abyde
and vndirly the ordinance and decrete of the Aldirman and consel of this burgh anent half a nettis
fisching of Done clamit be the said Wilyam / and ane achtand part of the crois cla
mit be the said robert / And monondai is assignit to thaim to produce thare documentis before the aldir
man and consel anent thare clame of the said fischingis

the same dai Adam of crafurd in presence of the aldirman ballies and diuers' of the consel gran
tit him tilhaf set to William more ane half nettis fisching of the furdis / and towarand
him the said demj nettis fisching as law wil

the aldirman and consel has deliuerit and ordanit that the half net pertening to Wilyam
moyses of the furdis sal remayn in the wattir as he is marrowit / quhil mo
nonday / and haf the profitis of the fisching tharof gif the demj net be fundin his

Item the action betuix Androw Waus and gilbert morison anent the debate and clame of vj li'
clamit be the said androw / the quhilk was put til ane assise and the consale bath / the
quhilkis has deliuerit / that the said gilbert sal pay and content til the said androw bot
four' pundis eftir the tenor of the act made tharuppon of before

The samyn dai Johne of lammyntoun androw lamminton' thom gray Duncan lammynton androw louson
alexander fyndlau John' of narn cristy prat thom of narne Sande lammynton Sande prat Rob
fleschar' and Wil of cardno flescharis / war convict be ane assise / for the breking of the act
made be the assise of before of the price of the selling of multon' Item for selling of flesch vnpri
sit and derrer than it was prisit Item for concelesing of price of the flesch eftir the apprising of it
til a man mare than ane vthir Item for making of lardnar in gret and sellin tharof / again the law
and statutis of burgh / quharfor thai and ilkane of thaim was adiugit in amerciament of the court
and to amend as law will and forbere in tyme tocum et cetera

the xx dai of februar' yer' et cetera lxxxiij In the court haldin in the tolbuthe before the aldirman and
ballies comperit William moyses . and rehersit how it was ordanit yistirday that his half
net of the furdis suld remayn in the wattir with Wil moris demj net / quhil mononday and sayd
that the said Wil more wald nocht thoil the said Wilyam moyses demj net nor his awne to
fisch like as it was ordanit / quharfor he protestit that in sa fer as he wald nocht lat him
fisch / that quhat scaith that he sustenit tharthrou that Wilyam more suld vprycht and assithe
him tharof

the same dai Johne gillespy producit for witnes be Johne the vaus in presence of the aldirman
and ballies the gret aith sworn deponit and declarit / that he gef j li' g' of the said John' the vaus'
at his bidding til alexander angusson towayr beyond the sey at this last rais' towayr
hame to the said John' in rynche wyne

Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xxiijo die februarij anno Dominj et cetera
lxxxiijo /

quo die curia affirmata Johannes stewart tercio die vocatus ad sectam Roberti culan
pro iniusta detencione x librarum non comparuit Ideo precipitur philippo de Dunbrek seriando capere
districtum de dicto Johanne et cetera et premunire eundem ad proximam curiam legalem tanquam quartum et diem
peremptorem huius processus / testibus summonicionis dicti Johannis ad hunc diem andrea murray seniore et alexandro gray

The same dai the Aldirman consale and communite has gefin and grantit til Robert of Kintor
son and ayr til vmquhile Richert of Kintor and til his ayris and assignais ane auch
tand part of the fisching of the Crois apon the wattir of Done eftir the termes of
this last generale assedacion of the said burgh be fullely complete and runnyn / for sic
like termes as the wattiris of the toune salhappin tobe set / and for siclike mayl
and gressom as nichbur' and vthiris pais for sic like wattir indurand the termes of the
assedacion tobe made / ffor the quhilk the said Robert has renuncit and owyrgevin
al richt and clame of rycht that he has or mycht haf in or to ony tak of wattiris
or be reson' of assigna til his modir of this last generale assedacion / now and for euir
because it is fundin be the aldirman and consale that the said Robert had na rycht til ane
achtand part of the crois clamit be him of this last generale assedacion et cetera

The samen dai Wilyam quelp grantit him tobe awand til Robert blindsele twa barellis
of Salmond quhilkis suld haf bene pait a yer' syne bipast for the quhilkis ij barellis
the said Wilyam is oblist topay to the said robert four' merkis be Sonday in mydlentrin and
falyeand tharof he sal pay the said robert twa barellis of Salmond at mydsummyr
next tocum / To the quhilk payment he has assingit his auchtand part of the fisching
of the crois to the said robert quhil he be content and pait of the said ij barellis of salmond / And
toentir with the said fisching at the said terme of mydsummir gif it falyeis of his payment
as said is . To the quhilkis Wilyam quelp is oblist be fath of his body Witnes John'
colison ser robert leis ser John' striuelin notar and vthir diuers'

Item the said dai the counsale and communite has grantit til obserue and keip til ser John' of ruthir
furd aldirman the promit made til him at the instance of my lord of erol / the lard of Drum
and mastir gilbert hay of vry . like as thai sal declare in the said promyt as it
was made et cetera

Item the samen dai the aldirman consel and communite has gevin and grantit til Wilyam quelp
ane auchtand part of the wattir of the crois quhilk he has in assedacion maylfre
indurand al the termes of this instant general assedacion last made / and quitclamis and
dischargis the said Wilyam his ayris and assignais of the said mayllis for al the
termes of the said assedacion / because the said Wilyam has renuncit and ouyrgevin
al richt and clame of rycht of half a net of Done quhilk he had vndir the com
mon Seil

Item the Aldirman consel and communite has gefin and grantit til Wilyam portar ane half nettis
fisching of the furdis til him his ayris and assignais / for al the termes of the next
assedacion tobe made / eftir the tenour of the samyn / payand tharfor sic like mail and
gressom as nichbur' and vthir pais tharvpon thai haf grantit the common seil

Item the aldirman and consel has deliuerit and ordanit that Wilyam moyses demj net of the
furdis sal remain in the wattir quhil thurisda / and in the meintym the fisching
tharof tobe put in androw branchis hand in keping

The xxvj dai of februar' yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij / the aldirman consel and communite has assignit
Jhone colison for the payment of sex merkis yerly tobe pait til Wilyam lutar' of the
said Johnes wattir mail for the said Williamis pencion quhilk he has of my lord
of crauffurd be virtu of the said lordis assignacion made to the said Wilyam be his
lettrez tharuppon / the quhilk vj merkis salbe allowit yerly to the said John' colison in
his wattir malis be the toune / he takand the said Wilyamis quittance of his ressate
yerly tobe deliuerit and schawin to the aldirman and ballies for his discharge and making
of thare acompt / et cetera

add.note: This marginal heading i splaced on page 831.

div.p:
Item the aldirman consel and communite has grantit and consentit for payment of viij merkis quhilkis
Wilyam moyses has pait to Wilyam giffard for half a net of the furdis and
for the owyrgevin of his rycht of the said wattir / that thare salbe allowit to
the said Wilyam moyses four' merkis of his wattir mail of this instant yer And vthir four' merkis in
the next yer' thareftir

Item the aldirman consel and communite has grantit and set til Johne menyes son' and ayr' til
vmquhile James menyes burges of abirdene the fisching of ane auchtand part of the
crois and til his ayris and assignais burgez and induellaris of this burgh for the termes of the
next general assedacion tobe made be the commission of the toune / for sic like mail and
gressom as nichbur' and vthiris pais . eftir the tenor and fourm of the next assedacion tobe made

The secund dai of merche yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij In the tolbuthe before Thomas of fife ane
of the ballies of abirdene comperit James lesly inquirand gif Alexander lesly of wardris had brocht
ony prefis how mekil beer' he ressauit eftir the fourm of the deliuerance of the assise / quhilk balye
saide that thar com nane before him to this'is' overwrites 'ar'. dai / quharfor the said James protestit that thar suld na
prefis be resauit in tym tocum in that matir vnto the tyme that he war warnit tharto / and that
he suld nocht be hurt forthir than the assise had deliuerit / offerand him redy tilhaf content and
pait sa fer as had bene previt / witnes alexander rede Johne Wormot and vthir sindry

Attour' James lesly producit thom Huntar duelland in bawnagask to declare quhat he knew
anent the said beer' / quhilk the gret aith sworn deponit that he knawis nocht how mekil
beer' James lesly intromettit with / of alexander' leslyis / bot he declaris / that thare wes vj bollis
of the wet beer' layd in the bote again vndir the atis / and that thar was gevin to thre wemen for
wyndowing of the hail corn / demj bollis of wet beer' / and for the leding of certane hidis fra the
schip to the ferry j f' of the beer' the vin to the said thom huntar and Johne yungar at the ferry

The thrid dai of marche yer' forsaid before Thomas of fife ane of the ballies of this burgh compe
rit in the tolbuthe Dauid strathachin familiar and factour til Alexander lesly of Wardris / and in the
name and on the behalf of the said alexander producit certane prefis vndirwritin anent the beer' de
batabil betuix him and James lesly that is tosay ser Johne malison chaplan and Androw graunt
quhilkis the gret aith sworn in presence of the said James and seueraly examnit concordialy
deponit and declarit be thare athis / that thai knaw that James leslyis seruandis be his
command' ressauit ix bollis and demj of beer' on the behalf of the said James / And that
Wilyam blindsel now ane of the ballies of abirdene on the behalf and at the charge of the
said James resauit iiijor bollis of the said beer'

Item James lesly producit Janet gib duelland in Kincorth the said David strathachin beand
present / and scho sworn deponit that scho kennis that thar was had again to the schip vj bollis
of beer' of the outtakin / and demj bollis gevin to the wemen that wyndowit the beer'
And scho inquirit gif scho wist quhat beer' James lesly resauit scho sayd scho knew nocht
nor how mekil was resauit on his behalf scho wate nocht
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem octauo die marcij anno predicto

quo die Actio processus ducta per Robertum culan aduersus Johannem stewart pro iniusta detencione x librarum
Respectuatur cum consensu parcium forma et effectu quibus nunc existit vsque hodie ad quindenam absque preiudicio parcium

It is ordanit be the court and the ballies that in tym cuming the baxtaris salbaik the fowat and crak
nel for j d' contenand x vncis of gude stuf and weil bakin brede / and the twa penny fowat
or craknel of xx vncis thareftir / and the twa penny laif of xxiiij vncis / and that thai haf
the penny brede redy toserue the toune like as thai ar chargit . vndir the pain of the vnlaw
and eschete of the brede / And in speciale Wil burges baxtar is forbiddin topreuene his nichburis
in the biing of victal quhil it be present in the merket vndir the pain forsaid

In the court haldin in the tolbuthe of abirdene be William blindsel and Dauid marr' twa
of the ballies of the samyn the xj dai of marche yer' of god et cetera lxxxiij Comperit george
of corntoune and schew ane obligacion made be Dauid menyes and William moyses til Wilyam
levingstoune of Wariston' of ellevin pundis of vsual monee of Scotland / the quhilk obliga
cione the saidis Dauid and Wilyam affermit and grantit / quharfor the ballies chargit the for
saidis Dauid and Wilyam moyses to content and pay the said some to the said george within
terme of law

The samyn dai the action debatabil betuix Dauid menyes yongar and Wilyam moyses
was put til ane assise the quhilk sworn and riply avisit deliuerit be gilbert the
vaus forspekar' that thai couthe pas na forthir' than a decrete producit before thaim
subscriuit with the handis of James lesly and robert blindsel and vndir alexander redis merk

Item the said dai comperit Androw ancroft and perofferit to Wilyam moyses xxxij s' and viij d'
in redy money apon the common kist before the ballies acht him apon a siluer peis' of the
rest of a gretar some / quhilk money the said William refusit / sayand that thar was acht
him iiij s' and iiij d' mare atour the said some

The xv dai of marche yer' forsaid In the court haldin be the ballies in the tolbuthe compe
rit henry bawne and grantit him tohaf resauit fra Johne the vaus on the behalf of
Androw galichtlie burges of Dundee four' pundis of blak money / And atour the said Johne
inquirit at the said androw gif he had ocht tosay til him anent the said iiij li' / quhilk androw
sayd he had na thing tosay til him anent that some And the said androw henry gran
tit him that the said money was sufficient payment quhen he ressauit it as he vndirstude

the samen dai the ballies has chargit Robert crag til content and pay til thom hatmakar
xlviij s' within terme of law of the vsual money of scotland / for the four' Danskin merkis
anent Wil richartson quhilkis extendis til the said some of xlviij s' of scottis money
as lent siluer eftir the deposicion of the witnes producit tharuppon

Item the said dai thom quhite was chargit be the ballies tocontent and pay til Johne the
vaus on the behalf of mariory fife his spous' j barel of Salmond within terme of
law in the quhilk he is bundin and gilbert quhite coniunctly and seueralie be ane obli
gacion because the said thomas has falyeit in his preif of the payment of the
said barel of Salmond

Thom of culan is ordanit todeliuer til gilbert of chameris wif a siluer belt be this dai
viij dais quhilk the assise has fundin scho has outred and pait for et cetera

The samyn dai it was decretit and deliuerit be ane sworn assise that henry bawne burges of abirdene
suld pay til Androw galichtlie burges of Dundee four' pundis eftir the tenor of the actis of the lordis
of our Souerane lordis consel that is tosay the inglis grot for ij s' and vthir siluer like as it had
passage the tyme of the cours' of the blak money / and tobe pait within terme of law

Item the said dai It was fundin and ordanit be ane assise Robert blindsel forspekar of the samen
that the half pak of wald quhilk was debatabil betuix thom quhite and margret the
spous' of vmquhile gilbert quhite suld be deliuerit to the said margret / And anent
half a pipe of wad debatabil betuix the saidis parties / alssune as the said margret
can bring ane certificacion before the aldirman or ballies of this burgh / that the said demj
pipe quhilk is arrestit in the feir' be thom of marr' for thom quhitis det / was the said
gilbert quhitis and his mark apon it / than thai fynd the said thom quhite dettour'
for the said half pipe of wad to the said margret / tobe deliuerit til hir in abirdene free
but ony aventur' / scho payand the fracht tharfor like as sic a pipe of wad pait in
Willekynnis schip at his last raiss' sa fer as extendis to the demj pipe
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xixno die marcij anno et cetera lxxxiijo /

quo die henricus bawne
inuenit plegium in manu Duncanj stralogh seriandi / quod Johannes vaus tenetur releuare eum de
quatuor libris penes andream galichtlie burgensem de Dundee in quibus alias adiudicatus fuit / et
quod inuriat / quod hoc non facit vnde dictus Johannes peciit diem legalem ad respondendum dicto plegio / qui sibi conceditur
videlicet dies lune proximo futuro

the same dai it was decretit and deliuerit be ane assise that Alexander angusson suld mak pay
ment til Johne the vaus of a pund gretis waring in rynche wyne like as Dauid ma
thoson sauld the lave of the pipe / within terme of law

Item the said dai thom of marr' grantit and oblist him tocontent and pay til Johne the vaus xl s'
of vsuale money acht be him betuix this and Witsundai next tocum withoute ony dilatou
ris of law or langar delay / before thir witnes Alexander rede gilbert the vaus ser Dauid
vaus curat of abirdene and vthir sindry

Item the assise ordanit that the seriand philp of Dunbrek sal mak penny of alexander tralis poyndis
for the det acht til William goldsmyth sa fer as thai ar of vail / and gif thai extend
nocht to the vail of the some' optenit be the said Wilyam / that the seriand tak ma poyndis
and mak penny tharof / quhil the said William be fullely content and pait
Curia legalis tenta in pretorio burgi de abirdene per balliuos eiusdem xxijdo die marcij anno predicto

quo die thomas Duncanson' in fynlaston' constituit magistrum Johannem hay rectorem de croudan
et Johannem sincler' procuratores suos coniunctim et diuisim / ad prosequendum Jacobum clerk pro xlv s' Inde x s'
debitis dicto thome / et ad releuare faciendum eundum constituen' de residuo dicte summe pro quo cepit
eum in plegio Et promisit de rato in presencia Dauid marr' ballivi et moricij besat

Eodem die wardatum fuit per curiam quod Johannes vaus premunietur ad comparendum crastina die in curia
ballivorum huius burgi ad respondendum plegio super eum porrecto per henricum bawne pro die peremptorio

Eodem die decretum fuit per assisam quod Johannes stewart senior iniuste detinet decem li
bras a Roberto culan pro quibus deuenit sibi debitor / et pro Judice dat' ex dicto decreto Idem
Johannes adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie / et ad satisfaciendum dicto roberto de huiusmodi summa infra
terminum Juris

Item ballivi assignauerunt Dauid mathei hodie ad octo dies cum consensu eiusdem ad respondendum plegio
porrecto pro parte alexandri angusson / quod dictus Dauid tenetur ipsum alexandrum releuare penes Johannem
vaus de j li' g' li waring in vino reuen' vt plenius patet in Inuencione plegij / et hoc pro
termino peremptorio
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxiijo die marcij anno et cetera lxxxiijo /

quo die decretum fuit per
curiam / quod seriandi premunient Johannem vaus legittime et coram testibus ad intrandum in curia coram
ballivis crastina die tanquam die peremptorio / ad respondendum plegio alias porrecto per henricum bawn'
ad releuandum ipsum henricum penes andream galichtlie de iiijor libris vt in plegio desuper
porrecto plenius continuetur / Cum Intimatione quod sine comparuerit sine non ballivi aut eorum alter in huiusmodi
causa procedent Justicia mediate

In the court haldin be the ballies of abirdene in the tolbuthe the xxiiij dai of marche
yer' forsaid comperit Johne the vaus folowit be a borgh strekit be henry bawn'
twicheing the releving of him of iiij li' anent androw galichtie and offerit him topreif
that actione endit and the said some pait quhare it suld be pait / and askit ane
lachful terme tobe assignit til his preif / and the ballies assignit til him this
dai xv daies to the said preif

The same dai the action folowit be Robert senyour apon thomas of marr' is continuit
with consent of parties quhil monondai cum viij dais / tilhaf ane end that dai as day
peremptour' be the samyn assise chosin tharuppon of before / and quhare ony of the
said assise falyeis totak sic like
Curia tenta in pretorio per ballivos xxvj die marcij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto /

quo die thomas
buchan et Willelmus burges conuicti per assisam quilibet eorum adiudicatur in amerciamento pro perturbacione
adinuicem et emendabit alter alteri ad visum proborum Et assisa ordinavit pro emenda quod
dictus thomas qui reperiebatur in maiori defectu / soluet j libra cere / et dictus Willelmus dimidium
libre cere ad lumen Sancti sanguinis / Et si aliquis illorum forisfecerit alteri impostrum pars
rea soluet xx s' ad fabricam beati nicholai absque remissione

In curia burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per iiijor ballivos eiusdem xxvijo die marcij anno
Dominj supradicto comparens Johannes gregory cum suo prelocutore patricio badenach dixit et
proposuit / quod ad eius noticiam deuenit quod quidam Johannes alloune intendit facere calumpniam
certis terris Jacentibus in li grene de quibus ipse Johannes gregory sasitus et possessus est a longo
tempore / quare dictus Johannes protestatus fuit et inhibuit dictis ballivis ne ipsi sue eorum aliqu
aliquam possessionem seu congnicionem facerent aut faceret dicto Johanni alloun vel cuicumque alt
de dictis terris cum partitis aut aliqua parte earundem donec ipse legitime premunitus fuerit
ad ostendendum Jura sua de eisdem / Et exhabundan' ad informandum animos dictorum ballivorum
produxit certas cartas super eisdem terris confectas ac perlegi publice fecit easdem in Judicio
Testibus alexandro menyes Roberto blindsel andrea Wode gilberto vaus domino Roberto
leis notario et philippo de Dunbrek seriando cum diuersis aliis

Eodem die comparuit in Judicio Andreas symson commorans in leith procurator thomas yar'
burgensis de edinburgh de cuius speciali mandato per litteras suas sigillo suo sigillatas
et in curia perlectas luculent' constabat / quj quidem procurator pecijt a Willelmo blind
sel summam trium celdrarum ordei vigore sue obligacionis ibidem producte et perlecte
sibi dari et persoluj nomine procuratorio quo supra / quj quidem Willelmus fatebatur summam conten
tam in dicta sua obligacione / vnde thomas fife ballivus onerauit eundem Willelmum ad soluendum
dictam summam ordei vel valorem eiusdem secundum tenorem sue obligacionis infra terminum Juris

Item eodem die Andreas vaus fatebatur se fore solutum et contentum per gilbertum morison
de quatuor libris vsualis monete scocie pro certis auenis in quibus ipse gilbertus alias adiudicatus
fuit per assisam / de qua quidam summa dictus andreas coram ballivis in Judicio quieteclamavit eundem
gilbertum nunc et imperpetuum

xxixno die marcij anno Dominj et cetera lxxxiiijto Actio plegij porrecti pro alexandro angusson aduersus Dauid ma
thei respectuatur cum consensu parcium forma et effectus quibus nunc existit sub spe concordie vsque hodie
ad octo dies absque preiudicio parcium

The same dai William blindsele ane of the ballies be the deliuerence of the court ordanit
Androw lambynton' topas with a deput of patrik andirsonis to colly and deliuer him ane of the twa
steris be cavil optenit be the said patrik / and til wprycht the price quhare the tane is fundin
war than the tothir / and that this be done betuix this and friday next tocum
Curia tenta in pretorio de abirdene per ballivos eiusdem vltimo die marcij anno quo supra

div.head: Assisa
div.p:
Robertus blindsel Johannes de Knollis gilbertus vaus gilbertus morison adam de craufurd
alexander de marr' thomas prat andreas murra senior Johannes steuart andreas Wentoun Symon de gardin
Ranaldus talyour murthacus glenmaluin andreas murra iunior Donaldus strathachin

The quhilk assise riply avisit has fundin and deliuerit / that William more was art and part
of the wranguis taking and spulying of certane nettis oute of Sanct nicholace warkhous'
that was tane be the maistir of wark at the ordinance of the consale and communite of the
toun and that he sal restore the said nettis again incontinent in the said warkhous' and
tocomper' on monondai next tocum to vndirly the ordinance of the aldirman and consel for the
said offens / borch for his comperans Robert blindsel
Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio per eosdem v die aprilis anno quo supra /

quo die thomas
alexandri in amerciamento pro iniusta lesione thome gordon et emendabit ad visum proborum / vnde
soluet ij s' pro / curacione dicti thome / et residuum v solidorum videlicet iij s' ad voluntatem assise / ex deliberacione
Willelmi Kintor prelocutorem eiusdem assise / plegio legali pro thoma alexandri gilberto chamer / et pro thoma
gordon' Willelmo portar et cetera

The same dai Johne gregory with his forspekar' alexander rede producit in Jugement
thre sindry chartiris of thre sindry landis liand in the grene made be vmquhile
Duncan alloune and his spous' Katerine cowtis to the said Johne as mouabil gudis in
mariage of the quhilkis landis ane lyis betuix the land of Johne thomson on the
north part / and the land of robert gillespy on the south part / ane vthir land
liand betuix the land of the ayris of vmquhile robert baron' on the west part /
and the land of the ayris of vmquhile William peterkyn on the eist part / and
the thrid chartir made of the southe half of a tenement pertening til vmquhile
the said Duncan allon' betuix the north half of the said Duncanis tenement / and
the kingis gate passand fra the triniteis to the quhite freris on the south part / and
made protestacion and inhibicion to the aldirman and ballies that nane of thaim tak on hand
togif state or possession' or knaulage of the said landis til Johne alloune or
ony vthiris considering that the said Johne gregory has schawin his infeftmentis and posses
sion' of the forsaidis landis / and quhat thing beis done in the contrar' of his rycht of
the saidis landis that it tvrn him nor his ayris to na preiudice et cetera

Actio plegij prosecuta per alexandrum angusson aduersus Dauid mathei / propter infirmitate eiusdem David respec
tuatur per ballivos in statu quo nunc existit vsque diem veneris proximo futuro sue preiudicio parcium

Johannes alloune inuenit alexandrum de camera filium plegium legalem quod Johannes gregory et pars
sua erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris et hoc in presencia plene curie
Et similiter Johannes gregory dedit thomam de marr' plegium de indempnitate Johannis allon' et cetera

Willelmus blindsel ballivus assignauit proximam curiam capitalem post pascha Johanni stephani ad respondendum
plegio super eum inuento per adam andree pro xx s' pro diuersis denariatis secundum exigenciam iuris

Item idem balliuus assignauit dictum diem iuridicum ade andree et Dauid marr' procuratori
et factori matri sue ad ostendendum Jura sua et documenta hincinde in curia huius burgi penes quoddam
orrium cum cauda clamat' per dictum Dauid nomine quo supra

compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Johannes alloune est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam Dun
canj alloun burgensis huius burgi patris suj / Et secundum quod docere et probare poterit de hereditate
sibi spectan' / curia decreuit ipsum deseruiri et assignari ad eandem per ballivos vt moris
est / Saluo Jure cuiuslibet et cetera

The vj dai of aprile forsaid in the court haldin in the tolbuthe be the ballies the
assise ordanit and deliuerit that Thomas of marr' sal content Robert senyour the rest of
his obligacion betuix this and Witsondai / And quhat tym that thom of mar settis
thom of scrogis dettour to Robert senyour for his walx that was takin in Dundee
William of tulidef sal content / Ista actio vbi sit mencio de Willelmo tulidef ponitur in sus
pensione quia nondum de ea assisa determinavit

The samyn dai eftir none in the tolbuthe the aldirman and consel with consent of the communite has
concludit and ordanit / becaus' Wil lachlan perseueris in his malice cumand in the toun
in contempcion tharof atour common ordinance and inhibicion nocht offerand him to the law and amendis
for the public offence the tharfor or ourtak' him
redeast with his complicis in tym tocum sal lay handis on him with g and supple of thaim that may a
gottin for the tym quhilkis ar ordanit to rys' and pas' with ony man of the toun' in that cas' and bring
him to the offisaris of this toun' to ger demain him as law wil / or at the leste at thai
that seis him erast gif thai be nocht of power' to dele with him warn' the offisaris of the
toun' sudandly tocum for his attaching causand to wate on him that he remofe nocht in
the menetym And quhat thing that ony man of the toune dois or sal hapin to do in the
persewing or taking of the said trespassour the hale toune has takin and takis the
querelle on thaim and defence tharof in al thing that eftir may folou .

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta per eosdem in pretorio eiusdem vij die Aprilis anno et cetera
lxxxiiijto

quo die comparuit Alexander alanj nomine et ex parte Johannis Waus et proposuit qualiter Idem
Johannes infirmabatur prout per certos capellanos et Dauid marr' balliuum ostensum fuit / quapropter
comparere non potuit ad probacionem actionis prout alias manucepit inter ipsum et henricum bawne
prout patet in Actis desuper confectis protestando quod quicquid inde factum fuerit cedat
eidem Johanni in preiudicium

Eodem die comparuit henricus bawne cum suis prelocutoribus Alexandro Irwin de lummey
et roberto blindsele et pecijt Johannem Waus vocari ad probacionem actionis inter ipsum
et henricum bawne penden' prout manucepit secundum tenorem acti precedentis / quo quidem Johanne
legittime vocato et non comparente hora diej legittime exspectat' dictus robertus
blindsele nomine prelocutorio quo supra extendit plegium in manu philippi de Dunbrek
seriandj quod dictus henricus deuenit ad suum clameum aduersus prefatum Johannem
penes reuelacionem eiusdem henricj de quatuor libris alias obtentis per andream
galichtly in defectu sue probacionis antedicte et Inde peten' wardam et Judicium
vnde propter debilitatem curie ballivi continnuarunt wardam et Judicium dicti plegii
vsque in feriam sextam proximo sequente absque preiudicio partis que non consencijt continuum

In the court haldin in the tolbuth' be the aldirman and baillies the ix day of
Aprile forsaid the action' and debate movit betuix thom quhite on the tapart
and James crag on the tothir part anent xx s' of annuel clamit be the said thomas
of the said James land anens a chartir made tharupon' is resplatit and continewit
to the law day eftir pasche with consent of partiis and than tobe decidit be the consale
quhedir the alienacion' of the said annuel and chartir made tharupon' be of avale
or nocht and the partiis ar oblist be the faithes of thar bodeis to vndirly the
deliuerance and ordinance of the said consale and quhilk of the partiis absentis thaim
sal tyne the caus' and clame

The action' betuix henry bawne and John the Waus is continevit be the
baillies with avis' of the counsale in sic forme' and effect as this day vnto the law
day eftir pasche And has ordanit henry bawne tobe warnyt to comper' the same day
as he wil tyne and wyn

Curia burgi de Aberdene tenta per ballivos in pretorio eiusdem decimo die Aprilis anno Dominj
et cetera lxxxiiij

quo die alanus smyth accusatus de iniusta perturbacione / Willelmi goldsmyth
et sue familie posuit se in voluntate balliuorum vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie
et ad emendandi ad visum proborum virorum plegio legali pro eo Willelmo quelp
de Indempnitate Willelmi goldsmyth et partis sue aliter quam per viam Juris

Et Willelmus goldsmyth inuenit Johannem de marr' plegium legalem de Indempnitate
alanj smyth et partis sue aliter quam per viam Juris et cetera

Duodeciam die mensis supradicti comparuit in curia coram ballivis Johannes de Kintor filius
et protestatus fuit publice quod occupacio facta per Dauid de Kintor de quod crofto
ipsius Johannis non preiudicaret sibi quo ad feodum suum et hereditate de eodem

Curia capitalis Burgi de Aberdene' tenta per balliuos In pretorio eiusdem
die lune post dominicam qua cantatur quasi modo genti videlicet vicesimo sexto
die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo quarto
quo die curia affirmata et sectis vocatis absentes patent In Rotulo sectarum et cetera

div.head: Assisa electa pro materijs et causis infrascriptis decidendis
div.p:
Jacobus lesly robertus blindsele Johannes cullan' Dauid menyes Alexander marr'
thomas prat Andreas branche Johannes andirson' Johannes glenmaling Willelmus
Kintor gilbertus murison' Johannes Wormot thomas marr' Johannes steward
Alexander sanquhar' gilbertus Waus Willelmus moyses

Quo die Willelmus garviach' Junior ad instanciam et requestam Domini Andree
thome pro suis laboribus In organis et aliis cultibus divinis In ecclesia
parrochiali factis et fiendis receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde dicti burgi
pro quinque solidorum prepositis oblatis et vino tantummodo propinando prestito ab eodem
Juramento solito et cetera

Eodem die Religiosus vir frater Johannes Ratree ordinis carmelitarum de Aberdene'
accessit ad barram et protestatus fuit pro annuo redditu sex solidorum et quatuor octo denariorum
priori et conuentui dicti ordinis debitoris et a longo tempore non solut' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico inferiorj quo itur ad ecclesiam beati Nicholaij ex boreali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis malisson' ex occidentali parte et terram Alexandri
Alanson' ex parte orientali Ad quam terram cum seriando et testibus infrascriptis accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram ballivis
tanquam secunda die huius processus protestando de administracione Juris sibi in premissis facienda
Testibus gilberto garviach Jacobo andirson et moricio besate seriando

Item et eodem die dictus frater Johannes Ratree prior conuentus dicti loci similiter
protestatus fuit pro annuo redditu viginti denariorum de quadam terra vasta Jacente
In ly grene ex parte boriali vici eiusdem citra pontem inter terram Johannis hill
ex occidentali parte et terram thome quhite ex orientali parte dicto priori et conuentui
annuatim debit' ad quam terram cum testibus infrascriptis accedens nichil inuenit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam secunda die huius processus testibus
seriando et testibus immediate precedentibus /

Eodem die dictus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator altarum beati
Duthaci in ecclesia parrochiali beati nicholaij de Abirdene / accedens ad barram protestatus
fuit pro quodam annuo redditu duodecim solidorum et sex denariorum dicto altari et capellano
ibidem deo seruientj debito et a longo tempore in solut' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico nauium inter terram Johannis mor' ex orientali parte et terram Magnj Wormot
ex occidentali parte ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides
quos presentauit in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Alexandro alanson'
Willelmo philp et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Item eodem die Willelmus andirson filius et heres quondam Jacobi andirson protestabatur
pro quodam annuo redditu quatuor solidorum et octo denariorum de quadam terra in vico
viridj vt patet in Rotulamento precedenti sibi debit' et accedens ad eandem nichil inuenit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam tercio die processus
testibus Willelmo cummyng Johanne blak et Duncano straloch seriando

div.head: Jo Kintor filius /
div.p:
Eodem die Johannes Kintor filius et heres quondam gilberti Kintor protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu xiiij s' de quadam terra vasta in vico furcarum vt supra In
precedentibus rotulamentis et accedens ad eandem nichil reperit ad distringendum pro dicto
annuo redditu infra terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam quarta die huius
processus testibus gilberto leche Dauid spens Andrea smyth et Duncano straloch
seriando

Et demum In curia perlectis tribus processibus precedentibus ductis per dictum Johannem
Kintor super recuperacione possessionis et proprietatis illius terre Jacentis in vico furcarum
ex parte orientali eiusdem vicj inter terram gilberti leche ex parte boreali et
terram ricardj cullan' ex australi parte ob non solucionem summe predicte eidem
annuatim de dicta terra debit' dictus Johannes pecijt a balliuis
secundum formam suj processus precedens Juris et Justicie complementum Tunc curia
diligenter auisata decreuit quod dictus Johannes Kintor dictam terram recuper
uit pro defectu solucionis quatuordecim solidorum prenotatorum. Et Judicium desuper
dictum fuit ex ore Willelmi modan Judicatoris dicte curie Testibus curie

The said day It was ordanit be the assis' that quhat somez' thom quhite
can prefe vnpait that James of crag is awand' til him that the said James
sal pay the said' somez' to the said thomas within lauchfull term
quhilk ordinance the baillies assentit to et cetera

Item quhar' that a borgh' was strekit be Wilyeam goldsmyth that Alan
smyth was ane vnlauchfull tennand' til him for the grete offencis and
iniuris that he did til him befor' and acht' nocht to remain langar in his
land na tobe tennand' til him / et cetera the aldirman and bailyeis be the
avis' and counsale of the Assis' ordanit the said Alan in continent toremofe
and deuoid' him of the said' Wilyeammis land of les na he couth'
obtene the said' Wilyeammis beneuolens and fauouris to remain quhil
Witsonday next tocum /

The same day Johne' stevinson' callit to the Instance of Adam
andirson' for xx s' wranguisly haldin fra him for certane penn
comperit nocht / as to the first day . / quharfor the said' Adam mad
protestacion' as efferis

TheThis whole entry has been deleted. said day . the Action' persewit be Dauid marr' in his moderis behalue
agane Adam andirson anens the clame of certane landis that his modir as he
allegis is iniunctfeft In / is continevit to this day xv dais but preiudice
of ony of the said partiis And the said Dauid made solempnit protestacion'
that quhat thingis be done' In ony of hir Junctinfeftment . in contrar' of
hyr rycht of the said Junctinfeftment and in contrar' of his fie and heretage in tym
The same day the bailyeis

The said day the bailyeis be the avis' of the hale court ordanit
Wilyeam mor' to content and pay Alexander traile the some' of xlj s' viij d' within
xv dais quhilk some' was obtenit apon' the said Wilyeame' be
certane arbitrouris chosin and sworn' to deliuer Justly betuix thaim / And in
the menetyme gif that Wilyeam mor' can prefe that the said Alexander
traile gat payment or allowance of ane half barell of keling
eftir the tenour of the said decrete / that the said Alexander sal content the
said Wilyeam tharfor' /

Item the Action' betuix Alexander traile and thom Jameson' anens a quartar of pund
of saferon' is continewit to xv dais and that day the said' thomas sal
ansuer' as day peremptour to the said Alexander in the said' caus'

The said day finlaw fores' was callit to the instance of John of lammynton
for the wranguis' withhalding of j li' g' and xvj s' g' as to the first
day / and comperit nocht et cetera

The said day Dauid Kintor callit to ansuer' til a borch' strekit apon'
him be Alexander traile for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xxiiij
akyn sperris v bollis of lyme and a cobil hyr' to gude commpt and reknyng
et cetera comperit nocht as to the first day et cetera

The forsaid xxvj day of Aprile Dauid marr' procuratour til his modir Annabel
traile comperit and schew certane euidentis vndir ballies seylis of certane
landis croftis and annuel rentis that his said modir was Junctinfeft In / And clamit
a pece of land be vertu of the saidis euidentis liand in the galowgate hede
to the quhilk pece of land Adam andirson' pretendis to haue rycht and clamys
that it is his fie and heritage et cetera The bailyeis assignit this day xv dais
to the said Adam to ansuer' to the said Dauid in the said action' And atour
the said Dauid protestit solempnitly that quhat thingis hapinnis tobe
done' anens ony landis croftis or annuellis that pertenis to his modir be reson'
of Junctfeftment that it turn' hir to na preiudice for hir tym na to him
eftir hir dais til his fie and heritage in tyme to cum

Anens the Action' of iiij li' persewit be henry bawne agane John the Waus
this day was assignit to baith' the said partis to comper' as thai wald'
tyne and wyn for the ending and declaring of the said matir / and the
said henry was warnyt to comper the said day . as was lauchfully
prefit in the court be the offisar' and witnes as efferit / And for his falt
of non apperence Sandy chamour seriand' was ordanit to pas and
distrenye the said henry for the some' of iiij li' that he was condempnit
In to Androw galichterly of Dunde and the said henry tuk forsably
his pundis of the said seriandis handis with the perelle of law . And to
ansuer' her'to he was warnyt and comperit nocht /

And to this day as day of peremptour set tharto Johne' of Waus comperit
and askit the said henry to comper' to her' him lauchfully prefe
this action' of clame of the iiij li' betuix thaim endit And he with
maistir Alexander fif his prelocutour schew and producit certane resons' of law
that the said action' was finally endit betuix thaim / of befor'
and eftir the tenour of the Actis gangand befor' anens the said' matir
In presence of aldirman and baillies in the hede court . the
quhilkis resons' war vngangesaid / for the tyme . becaus'
that na man comperit for the said' Henry to allege in contrar'
for his party .

Eodem die dominus Dauid Waus capellanus altarum beate marie magdalene accessit
ad barram et protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu dicto altari debit'
et a longo tempore insolut' ade quadam terra in vico viridj inter terram dicti
dominum Dauid ex boriali parte et terram quondam patricij coupar ex australi
Ad quam quidam terram accedens cum testibus subscriptis nichil inuenit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam primo die huius processus
testibus henrico quhitebrow Johanne gryg et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Item et eodem die Robertus blindsele accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro
quodam annuo redditu sibi debit' de quadam terra In vico viridj
inter terram Willelmi Andree ex boreali parte et terram quondam henricj mortymer
ex australi parte . Ad quam terram cum testibus infrascriptis accedens nichil inuenit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia tanquam / primo die huius
processus Testibus henrico quhitebrow Johanne gryg et philippo Dunbrek
seriando
